channel.title: [PI] ErasedPkz - Bug Fixes, Better Source & More Stability! [RE-RELEASE]
channel.description:
This isn't my source. This completely ErasedPkz with a few minor edits & bug fixes. I Added a '::vote2' into the client along with a music command;but I changed the item db as the one that it linked to was dodgy. Dungeoneering Master Cape emote was added but needs a fix as you need to click emote icon 2 times for the emote to work. Fixed Tzhaar respawn bug, added about 14 commands, fixed the qj in the help and commands command, fixed Jad & I also fixed the deposit inventory button.
Overall it's 99.9% ErasedPkz and 0.1% to me because I did do a bit of fixes, none the less, this is not my work. To change the name, go throughout the files and find 'ErasedPkz' and fill out whatever! :P
*Note: This is also a re-release as the original owner removed*
[B]ErasedPkz[/B] - Has beast combat! - 317 server with 633 character models and 602 cache. - Server is based to Pking and skilling. - Specials work 100% - Dragon claws works 100% - Dragonfire shield works 100% with charging! - 100% Working pvp armours and items ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! - Corporal beast lair - Edge is home - Working spell timers / spells! - Tormented demon! - Thieving from stall for money if needed - Working special / health bar - Banking works. - Skillcape emotes. - ::Pure on begin! - Nice Dfs handler - Awesome donator benefits! The Donator chest is really addictive some players even spended 40$ only on the chest it self!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aITt7KAcoB8
[B]Enjoy![/B]
Download Link: http://up.ht/pPiSCO [Client + Source]
